TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CivicAddressResolver extends System.Object implements class System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver
Public NotInheritable Class CivicAddressResolver Implements ICivicAddressResolver

summary.span: 提供用于将基于坐标的位置解析为市政地址的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的实现可为市政地址解析基于坐标的位置，如果位置提供程序提供坐标和市政地址数据。The class provides an implementation of that resolves a coordinate-based location to a civic address if the location provider provides both coordinates and civic address data. ## Examples 以下程序演示如何调用来同步解析市政地址。The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)] 以下程序演示如何调用若要以异步方式解决市政地址。The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化 类的新实例。The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the class. ```csharp CivicAddressResolver resolver = new CivicAddressResolver(); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Device.Location.CivicAddress ResolveAddress(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed
Public Function ResolveAddress (coordinate As GeoCoordinate) As CivicAddress

param.name: coordinate
param.span: ，它含有要解析为市镇地址的位置。

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: 同步地从基于纬度和经度的位置解析市政地址。

span.span: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: 正在解析地址时，此调用将阻止执行线程调用。

span.span: This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.

returns.span: 从 参数解析得出的市政地址。

span.span: The civic address that is resolved from the parameter.

returns.span: 如果无法解析地址，则返回 。

span.span: is returned if the address cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 地址解析操作完成时引发事件。The event is raised when the address resolve operation completes. 从已解决的市政地址`coordinate`参数由的成员传递给事件处理程序的对象。The civic address that is resolved from the `coordinate` parameter is returned by the member of the object that is passed to the event handler. ## Examples 下面的程序演示如何调用来同步解析市政地址。The following program demonstrates how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不包含有效纬度和经度。

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveAddressAsync(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed

param.name: coordinate
param.span: ，它含有要解析为市镇地址的位置。

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: 从基于经度和纬度的位置异步解析地址。

span.span: Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: 解析地址时，调用不会阻止执行调用线程。

span.span: The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下程序演示如何调用若要以异步方式解决市政地址。The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/cs/resolvecivicaddressasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/vb/resolvecivicaddressasync.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不包含有效纬度和经度。

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event ResolveAddressCompleted As EventHandler(Of ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 由对 的调用启动的地址解析完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the address resolution that was initiated by a call to completes.
